scene: JOKER                          AN ORIGIN                         Written by                 Todd Phillips & Scott Silver                                                  13 April 2018   This story takes place in its own universe. It has no  connection to any of the DC films that have come before it.  We see it as a classic Warner Bros. movie. Gritty, intimate  and oddly funny, the characters live in the real world and  the stakes are personal.  Although it is never mentioned in the film, this story takes  place in the past.  Let's call it 1981.  It's a troubled time. The crime rate in Gotham is at record  highs. A garbage strike has crippled the city for the past  six weeks. And the divide between the "haves" and the "have-  nots" is palpable. Dreams are beyond reach, slipping into  delusions.
